alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:05AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Elkhart, eastern St. Joseph, north central Kosciusko and northeastern Marshall Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 305 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Bend, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Bend, Elkhart, Mishawaka, Goshen, Nappanee, Bremen, Gulivoire Park, Dunlap, Granger, Osceola, Wakarusa, Bristol, Lakeville, Roseland, New Paris, Locke, La Paz, Indian Village, Woodland and Foraker. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 78 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko
